text: No one is coming to save you. Build it yourself.
author: NIX

text: Don't chase belts. Focus on improving every day.
author: Kieran

text: Survive a little longer each roll.
author: Kieran

text: A slightly dimmer Nix is better than no Nix.
author: Kieran

text: Be useful enough that keeping me around makes sense.
author: NIX
